title: Feelings & Friendship
description: Think about emotions and being a good friend!

prompts.input: Your friend looks sad at recess and is sitting alone. What are some things you could do to help them feel better? Why do you think those things would help?
hints: Think about what makes YOU feel better when you're sad
What could you say or do?

prompts.input: Sometimes people feel angry, and that's okay. But hitting or yelling isn't a good way to show anger. What are some better ways to handle feeling angry? Why are these better choices?
hints: What could you do instead of hitting?
